quoteList.quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
quoteList.author: Rumi

quoteList.quote: The Bay of Bengal is hit frequently by cyclones. The months of November and May, in particular, are dangerous in this regard.
quoteList.author: Abdul Kalam

quoteList.quote: Thinking is the capital, Enterprise is the way, Hard Work is the solution.
quoteList.author: Abdul Kalam

quoteList.quote: If You Can'T Make It Good, At Least Make It Look Good.
quoteList.author: Bill Gates

quoteList.quote: Heart be brave. If you cannot be brave, just go. Love's glory is not a small thing.
quoteList.author: Rumi

quoteList.quote: It is bad for a young man to sin; but it is worse for an old man to sin.
quoteList.author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quoteList.quote: If You Are Out To Describe The Truth, Leave Elegance To The Tailor.
quoteList.author: Albert Einstein

quoteList.quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out.
quoteList.author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quoteList.quote: While children are struggling to be unique, the world around them is trying all means to make them look like everybody else.
quoteList.author: Abdul Kalam

quoteList.quote: These Capitalists Generally Act Harmoniously And In Concert, To Fleece The People.
quoteList.author: Abraham Lincoln

quoteList.quote: I Don'T Believe In Failure. It Is Not Failure If You Enjoyed The Process.
quoteList.author: Oprah Winfrey

quoteList.quote: Do not get elated at any victory, for all such victory is subject to the will of God.
quoteList.author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quoteList.quote: Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life.
quoteList.author: Rumi

quoteList.quote: If you even dream of beating me you'd better wake up and apologize.
quoteList.author: Muhammad Ali

quoteList.quote: I Will Praise Any Man That Will Praise Me.
quoteList.author: William Shakespeare

quoteList.quote: One Of The Greatest Diseases Is To Be Nobody To Anybody.
quoteList.author: Mother Teresa

quoteList.quote: I'm so fast that last night I turned off the light switch in my hotel room and was in bed before the room was dark.
quoteList.author: Muhammad Ali

quoteList.quote: People Must Learn To Hate And If They Can Learn To Hate, They Can Be Taught To Love.
quoteList.author: Nelson Mandela

quoteList.quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
quoteList.author: Rumi

quoteList.quote: The less of the World, the freer you live.
quoteList.author: Umar ibn Al-KhattƒÅb (R.A)

quoteList.quote: Respond to every call that excites your spirit.
quoteList.author: Rumi

quoteList.quote: The Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
quoteList.author: Walt Disney

quoteList.quote: God Doesn'T Require Us To Succeed, He Only Requires That You Try.
quoteList.author: Mother Teresa

quoteList.quote: Speak any language, Turkish, Greek, Persian, Arabic, but always speak with love.
quoteList.author: Rumi

quoteList.quote: Happiness comes towards those which believe in him.
quoteList.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quoteList.quote: Knowledge is of two kinds: that which is absorbed and that which is heard. And that which is heard does not profit if it is not absorbed.
quoteList.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quoteList.quote: When I am silent, I have thunder hidden inside.
quoteList.author: Rumi

quoteList.quote: Technological Progress Is Like An Axe In The Hands Of A Pathological Criminal.
quoteList.author: Albert Einstein

quoteList.quote: No One Would Choose A Friendless Existence On Condition Of Having All The Other Things In The World.
quoteList.author: Aristotle

quoteList.quote: Life is a gamble. You can get hurt, but people die in plane crashes, lose their arms and legs in car accidents; people die every day. Same with fighters: some die, some get hurt, some go on. You just don't let yourself believe it will happen to you.
quoteList.author: Muhammad Ali

quoteList.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quoteList.author: Oscar Wilde

quoteList.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
quoteList.author: Marilyn Monroe

quoteList.quote: So many books, so little time.
quoteList.author: Frank Zappa

quoteList.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quoteList.author: Albert Einstein

quoteList.quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quoteList.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quoteList.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quoteList.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quoteList.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quoteList.author: Mae West

quoteList.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quoteList.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quoteList.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quoteList.author: Robert Frost

quoteList.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quoteList.author: Mark Twain

quoteList.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quoteList.author: Nelson Mandela

quoteList.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
quoteList.author: Walt Disney

quoteList.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quoteList.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quoteList.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quoteList.author: Oprah Winfrey

quoteList.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
quoteList.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quoteList.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quoteList.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quoteList.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quoteList.author: Maya Angelou

quoteList.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quoteList.author: Aristotle

quoteList.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quoteList.author: Abraham Lincoln

quoteList.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quoteList.author: Thomas A. Edison
